name: Taupō
description: Tropical passion fruit, red grapefruit, and zested orange.

name: Hanno
description: Resinous, douglas fir with citrus and lychee.

name: Glyphs
description: Tangerine, orange zest, and aromatic pine.

name: Jantar
description: Medium bodied lager with rich caramel sweetness, toasted bread with smooth, spicy finish.

name: Grandar
description: Crackery sweetness balanced with hops, floral and herbal notes that finish with a subtle citrus. Step mashed and hopped with nobles.

name: Gosev
description: Tart ale with notes of lemon, lime, sea salt and coriander. Lightly conditioned on Raspberries.

name: Aurantia
description: Double IPA hopped with our favorite lot of Citra.

name: Faust
description: Slightly sour, dry and oaky. Aged in oak foeders on our house microflora and conditioned on fresh plums.

name: Solem
description: Funky and dry. Pineapple, leather, and ripe peach.
